description.zh-CN: 粗野主义风格，采用大胆排版、高度对比和原始美学，刻意打破传统训讈惯例。透过鲜明视觉、非常规布局和勇敢的排版创造强力、富有表现力的介面。适合前卫项目和艺术应用，提供独特的视觉语言，结合美学原理与功能性训讈元素。
description.en-US: Bold typography, high contrast, and raw aesthetics that deliberately break traditional design conventions Creates powerful, statement-making interfaces through stark visuals, unconventional layouts, and fearless typography for creating powerful visual impact and bold interface design This style excels in creating bold, statement-making digital experiences that deliberately challenge conventional design norms Perfect for avant-garde projects and artistic applications This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences.
